#!/usr/bin/env ruby require "#{ENV['TM_SUPPORT_PATH']}/lib/plist" file = File.expand_path('~/Library/Preferences/com.macromates.textmate.latex_config.plist') if !FileTest.exist?(file) then file = ENV['TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT'] + "/latex_config.plist" end
File.open(file) do |f| # puts f.read @plist = PropertyList::load(f) end shortcuts = @plist['commands'] if ENV['TM_SCOPE'].match('beamer') then shortcuts.update(@plist['commands_beamer']) end name = STDIN.read if (shortcuts.has_key?(name)) then print shortcuts[name] elsif name.nil? print "\\${1:cmd}{$2} " else print "\\" + name + "{$1} " end
